name: Product Development Agency
title: Product Development Agency | Ship Products in 4 Weeks
metaDescription: Leading product development agency in Tamil Nadu. We build and ship your product from 0 to 1 in just 4 weeks. From research to launch, we handle everything.
heroSubheading: We're not just a dev shop. We're your technical co-founder—handling research, design, development, and launch.
description: At Lime Green Studios, we're more than a product development agency. We're your partner in transforming ideas into reality. Our proven 4-week process takes your concept from zero to a launched product, handling everything from market research to post-launch support.

painPoints.title: Can't Find a Technical Co-Founder
painPoints.description: Most founders struggle to find a technical partner who understands the product vision and can execute it.
painPoints.solution: We become your technical team. We don't just code—we think product-first, challenge assumptions, and build for real users.

painPoints.title: Agencies Take Too Long
painPoints.description: Traditional agencies quote 3-6 months for an MVP, by which time the market has moved on.
painPoints.solution: Our 4-week sprint methodology delivers a production-ready product in weeks, not months. Speed is our competitive advantage.

painPoints.title: Developers Don't Understand Business
painPoints.description: Most dev teams build what you ask for, not what users need.
painPoints.solution: We start with research and validation. We push back when needed. We build for outcomes, not just outputs.

features.title: Full-Stack Development
features.description: From frontend to backend, databases to deployment—we handle the entire technical stack.

features.title: Product Strategy
features.description: We don't just code. We help define what to build, what not to build, and why.

features.title: User-First Design
features.description: Every pixel is designed for conversion and clarity. Beautiful interfaces that users love.

features.title: Modern Tech Stack
features.description: React, Next.js, Node.js, AI integration—we use proven, scalable technologies.

features.title: Agile Sprints
features.description: Weekly check-ins, continuous feedback, and rapid iteration throughout the 4 weeks.

features.title: Post-Launch Support
features.description: We don't disappear after launch. Bug fixes, updates, and guidance when you need it.

process.overview: Our 4-week product development process is battle-tested across 15+ successful launches.

steps.title: Research & Validation
steps.description: We validate your idea, research competitors, define core features, and create a product roadmap.

steps.title: Design & Prototyping
steps.description: We design every screen, create interactive prototypes, and get your feedback before writing code.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: We build the product using modern tech, focusing on core features that drive value.

steps.title: Testing & Launch
steps.description: We test rigorously, fix bugs, polish the experience, and deploy to production.

faqs.question: How is a product development agency different from a software agency?
faqs.answer: A product development agency focuses on building complete products from ideation to launch, with product thinking at the core. We don't just execute specs—we help define what to build, validate ideas, and ensure the product solves real user problems. Software agencies typically focus on custom development based on detailed requirements.

faqs.question: Can you really build a product in 4 weeks?
faqs.answer: Yes! We focus on the MVP—the minimum viable product with core features that solve the main problem. We don't build everything at once. We build what matters, launch fast, and iterate based on real user feedback. Our 15+ successful launches prove the methodology works.

faqs.question: What if I don't have a technical background?
faqs.answer: Perfect! That's exactly who we work with. We translate technical jargon into plain English, guide you through every decision, and never make you feel out of your depth. Many of our best clients are non-technical founders with great ideas.

faqs.question: Do you work with startups or enterprises?
faqs.answer: Primarily startups and growth-stage companies. Our 4-week model is perfect for founders who need to validate ideas fast, launch MVPs, or build new products quickly. We love working with ambitious founders who value speed.

faqs.question: What happens after the 4 weeks?
faqs.answer: You get a fully functional, production-ready product. We also offer post-launch support packages for bug fixes, updates, and new features. Many clients stay with us as we scale their products based on user feedback.

faqs.question: How much does product development cost?
faqs.answer: Our pricing depends on complexity and scope. A typical 4-week MVP development project ranges from $15,000-$40,000. We provide fixed-price quotes after understanding your requirements. No hourly billing surprises.

name: Software Development Agency
title: Software Development Agency | Custom Software in 4 Weeks
tagline: Custom Software Development That Ships Fast
metaDescription: Premier software development agency specializing in custom software solutions. We build web apps, mobile apps, and enterprise software in just 4 weeks.
heroHeadline: Custom Software Development That Actually Ships
heroSubheading: From web applications to mobile apps to enterprise systems—we build software that solves real problems.
description: Lime Green Studios is a software development agency that combines technical excellence with speed. Whether you need a web application, mobile app, or custom enterprise software, we deliver production-ready solutions in 4 weeks.

painPoints.title: Projects Drag On for Months
painPoints.description: Most software agencies take 6-12 months to deliver, burning through your budget and patience.
painPoints.solution: We ship in 4-week sprints. You see progress every week, launch fast, and iterate based on real usage.

painPoints.title: Poor Communication
painPoints.description: Developers disappear for weeks, emerge with code you can't understand, and bill by the hour.
painPoints.solution: Weekly check-ins, transparent progress tracking, and fixed-price quotes. You always know where you stand.

painPoints.title: Technical Debt from Day One
painPoints.description: Cheap developers cut corners. Your 'working' software breaks at scale.
painPoints.solution: We build for the long term. Clean code, proper architecture, scalability baked in from day one.

features.title: Web Application Development
features.description: Modern, responsive web apps built with React, Next.js, and cutting-edge frameworks.

features.title: Mobile App Development
features.description: Native-feeling mobile apps for iOS and Android using Flutter and React Native.

features.title: API Development
features.description: RESTful and GraphQL APIs built for performance, security, and scalability.

features.title: Database Design
features.description: Robust database architecture using PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or Firebase.

features.title: Cloud Deployment
features.description: Production-ready deployment on AWS, Google Cloud, or Vercel with CI/CD pipelines.

features.title: Quality Assurance
features.description: Rigorous testing, code reviews, and QA processes to ensure bug-free launches.

process.overview: Our streamlined 4-week software development process delivers quality code, on time, every time.

steps.title: Requirements & Architecture
steps.description: We define technical requirements, design system architecture, and create a development roadmap.

steps.title: Design & Frontend
steps.description: We design the interface and build the frontend with pixel-perfect precision.

steps.title: Backend & Integration
steps.description: We build the backend, set up databases, create APIs, and integrate everything.

steps.title: Testing & Deployment
steps.description: We test thoroughly, deploy to production, and ensure everything runs smoothly.

faqs.question: What types of software do you build?
faqs.answer: We build web applications, mobile apps, APIs, SaaS platforms, enterprise software, and custom tools. If it runs on code, we can build it. Our specialty is business software that solves real problems and scales with growth.

faqs.question: Do you use off-the-shelf solutions or build custom?
faqs.answer: We build custom software tailored to your exact needs. We don't use templates or generic solutions. Every line of code is written for your specific requirements, ensuring you get exactly what you need.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with existing systems?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We regularly integrate with CRMs, payment processors, databases, APIs, and legacy systems. We have experience with Stripe, Salesforce, AWS services, third-party APIs, and more.

faqs.question: How do you ensure code quality?
faqs.answer: We follow industry best practices: code reviews, automated testing, continuous integration, and proper documentation. Every project undergoes rigorous QA testing before deployment. We write clean, maintainable code that future developers can work with.

faqs.question: What's included in the 4 weeks?
faqs.answer: Complete software development from start to finish: requirements gathering, architecture design, frontend development, backend development, database setup, testing, deployment, and documentation. You get a production-ready product.

faqs.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer post-launch support packages that include bug fixes, updates, feature additions, and technical support. Many clients keep us on retainer for continuous development.

name: AI Development Agency
title: AI Development Agency | Build AI Products in 4 Weeks
tagline: AI Product Development for the Real World
metaDescription: Leading AI development agency specializing in AI product development, machine learning integration, and intelligent automation. Build your AI product in 4 weeks.
heroHeadline: Build AI Products That Actually Work
heroSubheading: From AI-powered features to full ML products—we build intelligent systems that solve real problems.
description: Lime Green Studios specializes in AI product development that goes beyond the hype. We build AI-powered applications, integrate machine learning into existing products, and create intelligent automation systems that deliver measurable business value.

painPoints.title: AI Consultants All Talk, No Action
painPoints.description: Most AI agencies promise the world but deliver PowerPoint presentations.
painPoints.solution: We ship working AI products. Our portfolio includes AI caption generation, AI personalization engines, and more—all in production, generating revenue.

painPoints.title: AI Integration Seems Too Complex
painPoints.description: Adding AI to your product feels overwhelming and expensive.
painPoints.solution: We make AI accessible. We use proven models (OpenAI, TensorFlow) and integrate them seamlessly into your existing stack.

painPoints.title: Uncertain About ROI
painPoints.description: You're not sure if AI will actually improve your product or just add cost.
painPoints.solution: We start with a clear use case. We measure impact. We show you the numbers—cost savings, conversion lift, user engagement.

features.title: AI Product Development
features.description: Build complete AI-powered products from scratch—from idea to production-ready AI application.

features.title: ML Model Integration
features.description: Integrate machine learning models into your existing product for intelligent features.

features.title: Natural Language Processing
features.description: Chatbots, text analysis, sentiment detection, and language understanding systems.

features.title: Computer Vision
features.description: Image recognition, object detection, visual search, and AI-powered video analysis.

features.title: Personalization Engines
features.description: AI-driven recommendation systems, content personalization, and user matching algorithms.

features.title: Automation Systems
features.description: Intelligent automation, workflow optimization, and AI decision-making systems.

process.overview: Our AI development process combines cutting-edge technology with practical business application.

steps.title: AI Use Case Definition
steps.description: We identify the right AI application for your problem, define success metrics, and design the ML architecture.

steps.title: Data & Model Preparation
steps.description: We prepare datasets, select or train ML models, and create the AI pipeline.

steps.title: Integration & Development
steps.description: We integrate AI models into your product, build the interface, and ensure seamless operation.

steps.title: Testing & Optimization
steps.description: We test AI accuracy, optimize performance, monitor results, and deploy to production.

faqs.question: Do you build custom AI models or use existing ones?
faqs.answer: Both! For most use cases, we use proven models like GPT-4, DALL-E, or open-source models from Hugging Face—this saves time and cost. For specialized needs, we train custom models tailored to your data and requirements.

faqs.question: How much data do I need for AI development?
faqs.answer: It depends on the use case. For general AI features using pre-trained models (like OpenAI's GPT), you need minimal data. For custom ML models, we typically need hundreds to thousands of examples. We assess your data during Week 1 and advise accordingly.

faqs.question: What's the cost of AI development?
faqs.answer: AI projects typically range from $20,000-$50,000 depending on complexity. Simple AI integration (using existing models) is on the lower end. Custom model training and complex systems are higher. We provide fixed quotes upfront.

faqs.question: Can you add AI to my existing product?
faqs.answer: Yes! We regularly integrate AI features into existing applications. Common additions include chatbots, recommendation engines, search improvements, content generation, and intelligent automation. We work with your current tech stack.

faqs.question: How do you handle AI accuracy and reliability?
faqs.answer: We set accuracy benchmarks during Week 1, test rigorously during development, and monitor performance post-launch. We also implement fallback systems for edge cases and continuous improvement loops based on real-world performance.

faqs.question: What ongoing costs should I expect?
faqs.answer: AI systems have ongoing costs: API usage (if using services like OpenAI), cloud infrastructure for hosting models, and data storage. We provide detailed cost estimates and optimization strategies to keep expenses predictable and reasonable.

name: Software Product Studio
title: Software Product Studio | Modern Product Development
metaDescription: Leading software product studio specializing in rapid product development for startups. We think product-first, build fast, and ship in 4 weeks.
heroSubheading: We're not an agency. We're a product studio that thinks like founders, builds like engineers, and ships like startups.
description: Lime Green Studios is a software product studio built for founders who need to move fast. We combine product thinking, modern technology, and lean methodology to take ideas from concept to launched product in 4 weeks.

painPoints.title: Agencies Don't Think Like Product People
painPoints.description: Traditional agencies execute specs. They don't challenge assumptions or think about users.
painPoints.solution: We're product-first. We push back on bad ideas, suggest better alternatives, and build for user outcomes—not just feature lists.

painPoints.title: Building In-House Takes Too Long
painPoints.description: Hiring a team takes months. Training them takes longer. Your idea goes stale.
painPoints.solution: We're your instant product team. From day one, you have designers, developers, and product thinkers working together.

painPoints.title: Freelancers Can't Handle Complexity
painPoints.description: Individual freelancers are great for small tasks but can't build complete products.
painPoints.solution: We're a full product studio. Design, development, testing, deployment—we handle everything as a coordinated team.

features.title: Product Thinking
features.description: We start with the problem, not the solution. We validate ideas before building.

features.title: Lean Methodology
features.description: Build the minimum that solves the problem. Launch fast. Iterate based on feedback.

features.title: User-Centered Design
features.description: Every decision is made with users in mind. Interfaces that convert and delight.

features.title: Modern Stack
features.description: We use the latest technologies—React, Next.js, serverless, AI—to build fast and scale.

features.title: Startup Speed
features.description: We move like a startup because we build for startups. Weekly sprints, rapid iteration.

features.title: Full Ownership
features.description: You own the code, the design, the product. No vendor lock-in. Full IP transfer.

process.overview: Our product studio methodology is designed for speed, clarity, and outcomes.

steps.title: Product Discovery
steps.description: We dig deep into the problem, research users, validate the idea, and define what success looks like.

steps.title: Product Design
steps.description: We design the entire product—every screen, every interaction, every edge case.

steps.title: Product Development
steps.description: We build the product with clean code, proper architecture, and scalability in mind.

steps.title: Product Launch
steps.description: We test everything, fix bugs, deploy to production, and support your launch.

faqs.question: What makes a product studio different from an agency?
faqs.answer: Product studios think product-first, not project-first. We care about outcomes (users, revenue, growth) not just deliverables (code, designs). We challenge ideas, suggest alternatives, and act like your technical co-founder—not just a vendor.

faqs.question: Who do you typically work with?
faqs.answer: Founders and startups in the 0-to-1 phase. People with ideas who need to validate quickly, launch MVPs, or build their first product. We love working with ambitious founders who value speed and product thinking.

faqs.question: Can you help with product strategy, not just development?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Week 1 of our process is all about product strategy. We help define what to build, what NOT to build, who your users are, and how to validate demand before writing code. Many clients come to us with vague ideas—we help sharpen them.

faqs.question: Do you only build MVPs or can you scale products?
faqs.answer: Both! We specialize in MVPs because that's where startups need the most help. But we also help scale products—adding features, optimizing performance, handling growth. Many clients stay with us after launch as we evolve their product.

faqs.question: What happens if the product needs changes after launch?
faqs.answer: We offer post-launch support packages that include bug fixes, feature additions, and ongoing development. Many clients keep us on retainer for 2-3 months after launch as they gather user feedback and iterate.

faqs.question: How involved do I need to be during the 4 weeks?
faqs.answer: Very involved! We have weekly check-ins where we present progress and get your feedback. You're the product owner—we need your input on features, design, and priorities. But we don't need you full-time; a few hours per week is enough.

name: SaaS Development
title: SaaS Development | Build Your SaaS in 4 Weeks
metaDescription: Expert SaaS development services. We build scalable SaaS applications with subscription billing, multi-tenancy, and modern architecture in 4 weeks.
heroHeadline: Build Your SaaS Product in 4 Weeks
heroSubheading: From idea to paying customers—we build subscription-based SaaS applications that scale.
description: Lime Green Studios specializes in SaaS product development. We build multi-tenant SaaS applications with subscription billing, user management, and scalable architecture that can grow from 10 to 10,000 users.

painPoints.title: SaaS Architecture Is Complex
painPoints.description: Multi-tenancy, billing, subscriptions, permissions—SaaS has unique technical challenges.
painPoints.solution: We've built multiple SaaS products. We handle tenant isolation, subscription logic, billing integration, and security from day one.

painPoints.title: Billing Integration Seems Overwhelming
painPoints.description: Stripe, subscription plans, trials, upgrades, cancellations—it's a lot to figure out.
painPoints.solution: We integrate Stripe or any payment processor, set up subscription plans, handle trials, and build customer portals for self-service.

painPoints.title: Scaling From 10 to 1000 Users
painPoints.description: Your MVP works for 10 users. But will it handle 1000? 10,000?
painPoints.solution: We build for scale from day one. Proper database design, caching strategies, and cloud infrastructure that grows with you.

features.title: Multi-Tenant Architecture
features.description: Secure data isolation between customers while sharing the same application infrastructure.

features.title: Subscription Billing
features.description: Stripe integration with multiple pricing tiers, trials, upgrades, and automated invoicing.

features.title: User Management
features.description: Authentication, role-based permissions, team management, and SSO support.

features.title: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Powerful admin panel to manage users, subscriptions, analytics, and system health.

features.title: API & Integrations
features.description: RESTful APIs for third-party integrations and webhook support for automation.

features.title: Analytics & Reporting
features.description: Built-in analytics for tracking usage, revenue, churn, and user behavior.

process.overview: Our SaaS development process delivers production-ready subscription software in 4 weeks.

steps.title: SaaS Planning
steps.description: We define your SaaS model, pricing strategy, core features, and technical architecture.

steps.title: Core SaaS Features
steps.description: We build authentication, user management, subscription logic, and billing integration.

steps.title: Feature Development
steps.description: We build your unique SaaS features that differentiate you from competitors.

steps.title: Testing & Launch
steps.description: We test payment flows, security, performance, and deploy your SaaS to production.

faqs.question: What's included in SaaS development?
faqs.answer: Everything you need to run a subscription business: user authentication, subscription billing (Stripe integration), multi-tenant database architecture, admin dashboard, user roles and permissions, customer portal, and analytics. You get a complete SaaS platform ready for paying customers.

faqs.question: How do you handle multi-tenant data isolation?
faqs.answer: We use proven multi-tenant patterns: either shared database with tenant ID filtering (cost-effective for most SaaS) or separate schemas/databases (for enterprise clients). We ensure complete data isolation so customers can never see each other's data.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with my existing payment processor?
faqs.answer: Yes! While we primarily use Stripe (it's the industry standard), we can integrate with Paddle, Lemon Squeezy, or any payment processor you prefer. We handle subscription creation, upgrades, downgrades, and cancellations automatically.

faqs.question: What about free trials and pricing tiers?
faqs.answer: We build complete pricing tier logic: free trials (14 days, 30 days, etc.), multiple subscription plans (Starter, Pro, Enterprise), feature gates based on plan, and smooth upgrade/downgrade flows. All integrated with your payment processor.

faqs.question: How do you ensure my SaaS can scale?
faqs.answer: We use serverless architecture (auto-scales with demand), proper database indexing, caching strategies (Redis), and CDN for assets. We also design the database schema to handle millions of records efficiently. Your SaaS can grow without architectural rewrites.

faqs.question: Do you provide ongoing SaaS maintenance?
faqs.answer: Yes! SaaS products need ongoing attention: bug fixes, feature updates, security patches, and optimization. We offer monthly retainer packages starting at $2,000/month for continued development and support.

name: ERP Development
title: ERP Development | Custom ERP Systems in 4 Weeks
tagline: Enterprise Resource Planning That Actually Works
metaDescription: Custom ERP development services for businesses. We build tailored ERP systems for inventory, operations, finance, and HR management in 4 weeks.
heroSubheading: Stop forcing your business into generic ERP software. Get a system built for your exact processes.
description: Lime Green Studios builds custom ERP systems tailored to your business. Whether you need inventory management, order processing, financial tracking, or custom workflows, we build ERP solutions that fit your operations perfectly.

painPoints.title: Off-the-Shelf ERP Doesn't Fit
painPoints.description: SAP, Oracle, and generic ERPs force you to change your business to fit their software.
painPoints.solution: We build custom ERP systems molded to your exact processes, workflows, and business rules. Your ERP adapts to you, not the other way around.

painPoints.title: Implementation Takes Years
painPoints.description: Traditional ERP implementations drag on for 12-24 months and cost millions.
painPoints.solution: We deliver MVP ERP systems in 4 weeks with core modules working. We then iterate and add modules based on your priorities.

painPoints.title: Too Complex for Your Team
painPoints.description: Enterprise ERPs require extensive training. Your team spends months learning the system.
painPoints.solution: We design intuitive interfaces that your team can learn in days. Custom workflows match how your team already works.

features.title: Inventory Management
features.description: Track stock levels, manage warehouses, automate reordering, and handle multiple locations.

features.title: Order Processing
features.description: Manage orders from creation to fulfillment, with automated workflows and status tracking.

features.title: Financial Management
features.description: Track expenses, revenue, invoicing, payments, and generate financial reports.

features.title: Custom Workflows
features.description: Automate your unique business processes with custom workflow engines.

features.title: Reporting & Analytics
features.description: Real-time dashboards, custom reports, and data exports for business intelligence.

features.title: Integration Capabilities
features.description: Connect with existing tools, third-party services, and legacy systems via APIs.

process.overview: Our ERP development process focuses on understanding your business first, then building the system.

steps.title: Business Process Mapping
steps.description: We map your current processes, identify pain points, and design the ERP architecture.

steps.title: Core Module Development
steps.description: We build the most critical ERP module first (usually inventory or orders) with full functionality.

steps.title: Additional Modules
steps.description: We add secondary modules and integrate them with the core system.

steps.title: Testing & Deployment
steps.description: We test with real data, train your team, and deploy the system for production use.

faqs.question: How is custom ERP different from Odoo or SAP?
faqs.answer: Custom ERP is built specifically for your business processes. Odoo and SAP are configurable but force you into their structure. With custom ERP, we code exactly what you need—no more, no less. You get precisely the workflows, reports, and features you want.

faqs.question: Can you build ERP for specific industries?
faqs.answer: Yes! We've built ERP systems for manufacturing, retail, distribution, healthcare, and services. We learn your industry's specific requirements (like compliance, regulatory needs, or unique workflows) and build accordingly.

faqs.question: What about data migration from our current system?
faqs.answer: We handle data migration as part of the implementation. We extract data from your current system (Excel, legacy software, or another ERP), clean it, and import it into the new system. We ensure zero data loss during the transition.

faqs.question: Can the ERP integrate with our existing software?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We build APIs and integrations for accounting software (QuickBooks, Xero), CRMs (Salesforce, HubSpot), e-commerce platforms (Shopify, WooCommerce), and payment processors (Stripe, PayPal). If it has an API, we can integrate.

faqs.question: How much does custom ERP development cost?
faqs.answer: ERP projects typically range from $25,000-$75,000+ depending on complexity and number of modules. A basic 2-3 module ERP (inventory + orders + finance) starts around $30,000. We provide detailed quotes after understanding your requirements.

faqs.question: What ongoing support do you provide?
faqs.answer: We offer maintenance packages that include bug fixes, feature additions, performance optimization, and technical support. Most clients keep us on monthly retainer ($2,500-$5,000/month) for continued development and support.

name: HRMS Development
title: HRMS Development | HR Management System in 4 Weeks
tagline: Modern HR Software for Modern Teams
metaDescription: Custom HRMS development services. We build HR management systems with employee records, payroll, attendance, leave management, and performance tracking.
heroSubheading: Employee management, payroll, attendance, and HR workflows—all in one system built for your company.
description: Lime Green Studios builds custom HRMS (Human Resource Management Systems) tailored to your company's HR processes. From employee onboarding to payroll to performance reviews, we create HR software that simplifies people management.

painPoints.title: Generic HR Software Doesn't Fit
painPoints.description: BambooHR and Workday are built for US companies. Your local payroll rules and workflows don't fit.
painPoints.solution: We build HRMS that follows your country's labor laws, tax rules, and payroll requirements. Custom workflows for your exact HR processes.

painPoints.title: Too Many Spreadsheets
painPoints.description: Employee data in Excel, attendance in one app, payroll in another. Nothing talks to each other.
painPoints.solution: We build unified HRMS where everything is connected. One system for all HR data with automated workflows between modules.

painPoints.title: Expensive Enterprise Solutions
painPoints.description: Enterprise HRMS costs thousands per month and requires a full-time admin.
painPoints.solution: Custom HRMS built for your exact needs, with one-time development cost and minimal ongoing fees. No per-user pricing trap.

features.title: Employee Database
features.description: Centralized employee records with personal details, documents, employment history, and more.

features.title: Attendance & Leave
features.description: Track attendance, manage leave requests, approve time-off, and generate attendance reports.

features.title: Payroll Management
features.description: Calculate salaries, deductions, taxes, and generate payslips automatically based on your rules.

features.title: Performance Management
features.description: Set goals, conduct reviews, track performance metrics, and manage appraisals.

features.title: Recruitment & Onboarding
features.description: Post jobs, track applicants, manage interviews, and automate new hire onboarding.

features.title: Reports & Analytics
features.description: HR dashboards, headcount reports, turnover analysis, and custom HR metrics.

process.overview: Our HRMS development process focuses on your specific HR workflows and compliance requirements.

steps.title: HR Process Analysis
steps.description: We document your HR workflows, payroll rules, leave policies, and compliance requirements.

steps.title: Core HR Module
steps.description: We build the employee database, attendance tracking, and leave management system.

steps.title: Payroll & Automation
steps.description: We build payroll calculation engine, integrate with attendance, and automate salary generation.

steps.title: Testing & Deployment
steps.description: We test with real employee data, train HR team, and deploy the system.

faqs.question: Can you build HRMS for my country's labor laws?
faqs.answer: Yes! We build HRMS with country-specific payroll rules, tax calculations, leave policies, and compliance requirements. We work with you and your HR team to understand local regulations and build the system accordingly.

faqs.question: What's included in the HRMS system?
faqs.answer: Typical HRMS includes employee database, attendance tracking, leave management, payroll calculation, payslip generation, performance reviews, document management, and HR reports. We customize based on your priorities.

faqs.question: Can employees access the HRMS?
faqs.answer: Yes! We build employee self-service portals where employees can view their profiles, apply for leave, download payslips, update personal information, and view attendance—reducing HR's administrative burden.

faqs.question: How do you handle payroll calculations?
faqs.answer: We build custom payroll engines based on your salary structure, deductions (taxes, insurance, loans), allowances, and bonuses. The system auto-calculates salaries based on attendance and approved leaves. We handle complex scenarios like pro-rated salaries and mid-month joinings.

faqs.question: Can the HRMS integrate with accounting software?
faqs.answer: Yes! We can integrate with accounting systems like QuickBooks, Tally, Zoho Books, and more. Payroll data can automatically sync to your accounting software for seamless financial management.

faqs.question: What's the cost of custom HRMS development?
faqs.answer: HRMS projects typically range from $20,000-$50,000 depending on complexity and number of modules. A basic system (employees + attendance + leave + payroll) starts around $25,000. Enterprise systems with recruitment, performance, and advanced features cost more.

name: HMS Development
title: HMS Development | Healthcare Management System
tagline: Healthcare Software That Improves Patient Care
metaDescription: Custom HMS development services. We build hospital management systems, clinic software, and healthcare applications with patient records, appointments, and billing.
heroSubheading: Patient management, appointments, billing, and medical records—all in one secure healthcare platform.
description: Lime Green Studios builds custom Hospital Management Systems (HMS) and healthcare software. From small clinics to multi-specialty hospitals, we create HIPAA-compliant systems that improve patient care and streamline operations.

painPoints.title: Paper Records Are Inefficient
painPoints.description: Managing patient records, prescriptions, and medical history on paper is slow and error-prone.
painPoints.solution: We digitize everything. Electronic medical records, prescription history, test results, and patient notes—all searchable and accessible instantly.

painPoints.title: No Integration Between Departments
painPoints.description: Reception, doctors, pharmacy, and billing all use different systems that don't talk to each other.
painPoints.solution: We build unified HMS where all departments share the same patient data. When a doctor prescribes, pharmacy sees it. When pharmacy dispenses, billing knows.

painPoints.title: Generic Hospital Software Is Too Complex
painPoints.description: Enterprise HMS is built for 500-bed hospitals. Small clinics can't afford or use them.
painPoints.solution: We build HMS scaled to your needs. Whether you're a 5-doctor clinic or 50-bed hospital, we build exactly what you need—no bloat.

features.title: Patient Management
features.description: Complete patient records, medical history, allergies, prescriptions, and visit tracking.

features.title: Appointment Scheduling
features.description: Online booking, doctor schedules, calendar management, and automated reminders via SMS/email.

features.title: Electronic Medical Records
features.description: Digital patient records, diagnosis history, treatment plans, and medical notes.

features.title: Billing & Invoicing
features.description: Generate bills, track payments, insurance claims, and financial reporting.

features.title: Pharmacy Management
features.description: Inventory tracking, prescription management, drug database, and expiry alerts.

features.title: Lab & Diagnostics
features.description: Test orders, results entry, report generation, and integration with lab equipment.

process.overview: Our HMS development process ensures compliance, security, and usability for healthcare professionals.

steps.title: Healthcare Workflow Analysis
steps.description: We map your hospital/clinic workflows, understand compliance requirements, and design the system.

steps.title: Patient & Appointment Module
steps.description: We build patient registration, medical records, and appointment scheduling system.

steps.title: Billing & Department Modules
steps.description: We build billing, pharmacy, and lab modules with full integration.

steps.title: Security & Deployment
steps.description: We implement security measures, test thoroughly, train staff, and deploy the system.

faqs.question: Is the HMS HIPAA compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes! We build healthcare systems with HIPAA compliance in mind: encrypted data storage, secure access controls, audit logs, and patient data privacy. We use HIPAA-compliant cloud infrastructure and follow healthcare data security best practices.

faqs.question: Can patients access their records online?
faqs.answer: Yes! We build patient portals where patients can view their medical history, upcoming appointments, test results, prescriptions, and bills. Patients can also book appointments online and communicate with doctors securely.

faqs.question: Does the HMS work for multi-specialty hospitals?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We build HMS for multi-specialty hospitals with department-specific workflows, multiple doctor schedules, different billing rates, and specialized modules (like radiology, surgery, ICU management). The system scales to your complexity.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with diagnostic equipment?
faqs.answer: Yes! We can integrate with lab equipment, X-ray machines, ECG devices, and other diagnostic tools that support HL7 or DICOM standards. Test results automatically populate in patient records without manual entry.

faqs.question: What about insurance claim management?
faqs.answer: We build insurance modules that handle claim generation, insurance panel management, cashless approvals, and claim tracking. We can integrate with insurance company APIs where available or provide manual workflow management.

faqs.question: How much does HMS development cost?
faqs.answer: HMS projects typically range from $30,000-$80,000+ depending on hospital size and features. A basic clinic system (patients + appointments + billing + EMR) starts around $30,000. Full hospital systems with pharmacy, lab, inventory cost more.

name: LMS Development
title: LMS Development | Learning Management System
metaDescription: Custom LMS development services. We build learning management systems with course creation, student management, assessments, and online education platforms.
heroSubheading: Course creation, student enrollment, assessments, and certificates—complete LMS for online education.
description: Lime Green Studios builds custom Learning Management Systems (LMS) for online courses, corporate training, and educational institutions. From course creation to student progress tracking, we build platforms that make online learning effective.

painPoints.title: Generic LMS Platforms Are Limited
painPoints.description: Moodle and Canvas are free but clunky. Paid LMS platforms charge per student and lock you in.
painPoints.solution: We build custom LMS with exactly the features you need. No per-student fees. You own the platform. Scale unlimited students without cost increase.

painPoints.title: No Support for Your Teaching Style
painPoints.description: You teach live cohorts, not self-paced courses. Your LMS doesn't support your model.
painPoints.solution: We build LMS for any teaching model: self-paced courses, live cohorts, hybrid learning, corporate training, or school/university systems.

painPoints.title: Poor Student Experience
painPoints.description: Students drop off because the platform is confusing and outdated.
painPoints.solution: We design modern, intuitive interfaces that students love. Video streaming, interactive content, gamification, and mobile-first design.

features.title: Course Management
features.description: Create courses, organize modules, upload videos, add quizzes, and manage course content easily.

features.title: Student Enrollment
features.description: Student registration, course enrollment, payment integration, and automated onboarding.

features.title: Video Streaming
features.description: Secure video hosting, adaptive streaming, progress tracking, and DRM protection to prevent piracy.

features.title: Assessments & Quizzes
features.description: Create quizzes, assignments, and exams with auto-grading and detailed analytics.

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Track student progress, completion rates, quiz scores, and engagement metrics.

features.title: Certificates
features.description: Auto-generate completion certificates with custom designs and verification codes.

process.overview: Our LMS development process creates engaging learning platforms tailored to your teaching methodology.

steps.title: Learning Model Design
steps.description: We understand your teaching model, content structure, and student journey to design the perfect LMS.

steps.title: Course & Content Module
steps.description: We build course creation tools, video upload, content organization, and student-facing course pages.

steps.title: Assessment & Engagement
steps.description: We build quizzes, assignments, progress tracking, and gamification features.

steps.title: Payment & Launch
steps.description: We integrate payments, set up email automation, test thoroughly, and deploy the LMS.

faqs.question: Can you build LMS for live cohort-based courses?
faqs.answer: Yes! We build LMS for both self-paced and cohort-based learning. For cohorts, we add features like batch management, live class scheduling, cohort-specific content unlocking, and peer interaction tools.

faqs.question: How do you handle video content protection?
faqs.answer: We use secure video hosting with DRM (Digital Rights Management) to prevent video downloads. We also implement watermarking, domain restrictions, and geo-blocking if needed. Videos stream securely without allowing easy piracy.

faqs.question: Can students interact with instructors?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We build discussion forums, Q&A sections, direct messaging, and even live chat features. For live courses, we can integrate with Zoom or build custom video conferencing. Students can ask questions and get instructor feedback.

faqs.question: Does the LMS support different pricing models?
faqs.answer: Yes! We support one-time course purchase, subscription access (monthly/annual all-access passes), pay-per-course, free trials, and bundled courses. We integrate with Stripe or Razorpay for automated billing.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with Zoom or Google Meet?
faqs.answer: Yes! For live classes, we integrate with Zoom, Google Meet, or Microsoft Teams. Students can join live sessions directly from the LMS. Recording links automatically appear in course content after the session.

faqs.question: What's the cost of LMS development?
faqs.answer: LMS projects range from $20,000-$60,000 depending on features. A basic LMS (courses + videos + quizzes + payments) starts around $25,000. Advanced features like live classes, mobile apps, gamification, and AI add to the cost.
